list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: musical instruments played by striking with the hand or with a handheld or pedal-operated stick or beater, or by shaking, including drums, cymbals, xylophones, gongs, bells, and rattles.
the striking of one solid object with or against another with some degree of force.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the clattering percussion of objects striking the walls and the shutters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bộ gõ của các vật thể đánh vào các bức tường và cửa chớp
